webscript.description: Node Changes reindex can be used to get all documents from a specific path reindexDocumentsFrom = /app:company_home will reindex every document including userhome reindexDocumentsFrom = /app:company_home/st:sites will reindex every document in all sites reindexDocumentsFrom = /app:company_home/st:sites/_specificsitename_ will reindex all documents in a specific site Documents can be replaced by Folders in above examples
